name: Little Firefighters v5
description:
Try to save the citizens from the burned building.

Step 1: follow the arrow direction to park your firetruck
Step 2: go into house as a firefighter rescue the civilians (4 in total)
Step 3:  After rescuing all civilians, get out and reach the green spot (located at front entrance of building) before time runs out or you lose all 3 lives.

Control:
Use W, A, S, D or arrow keys to control the firefighter/ firetruck
use mouse to determine direction to go to
press p- pause/play
press q- switch between firefighter/ firetruck
press r- replay game
press m- to go back to menu
press c- to close fire safety tip

Firefighter
press e- to save civilian (must be near civilian)
left click on mouse- swing axe
right click on mouse- shoot water projectile (removes fire)
press scroller on mouse - place ladder (must be where ladder outline appears)

Firetruck
press scroller on mouse - turn on/off lights left click on mouse- turn on/off sirens (stop vehicles moving)
right click on mouse- shoot water projectile (removes fire)

Source game and steps to run game on Unity:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1x6jTcqEOM8N9Grv6dGeF3K2hx-zkK2Cx
